sql.query: SELECT a.TRD_DD, CAST(a.CLSPRC as int), CAST(a.OPNPRC as int), CAST(a.HGPRC as int), CAST(a.LWPRC as int), a.TRDVOL, a.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM CHART_TEST_DATA a, CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM b WHERE a.TRD_DD = b.TRD_DD AND a.CODE = b.CODE AND a.CODE = ? AND b.NUM <= 500 ORDER BY a.TRD_DD

mapping.getProperty: axis, close, open, high, low, trdvol, forn_ord_lmt_qty

sql.query: SELECT a.TRD_DD, CAST(a.CLSPRC as int), CAST(a.OPNPRC as int), CAST(a.HGPRC as int), CAST(a.LWPRC as int), a.TRDVOL, a.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM CHART_TEST_DATA a, CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM b WHERE a.TRD_DD = b.TRD_DD AND a.CODE = b.CODE AND a.CODE = ? AND b.NUM BETWEEN (SELECT MIN(NUM) FROM CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM WHERE TRD_DD <= ? AND CODE = ?) AND (SELECT MIN(NUM) FROM CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM WHERE TRD_DD <= ? AND CODE = ?) + 99 ORDER BY a.TRD_DD

mapping.getProperty: axis, close, open, high, low, trdvol, forn_ord_lmt_qty

sql.query:
SELECT a.TRD_DD, CAST(b.CLSPRC as int), CAST(a.OPNPRC as int), CAST(c.HGPRC as int), CAST(c.LWPRC as int), c.TRDVOL, a.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM (SELECT T1.TRD_DD, T1.OPNPRC, T1.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY, T2.TRD_DD_WEEK FROM (SELECT TRD_DD, OPNPRC, FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ?) T1,
(SELECT MIN(TRD_DD) TRD_DD, TRD_DD_WEEK FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA_WEEK GROUP BY TRD_DD_WEEK) T2 WHERE T1.TRD_DD = T2.TRD_DD) a,
(SELECT T1.TRD_DD, T1.CLSPRC, T2.TRD_DD_WEEK FROM (SELECT TRD_DD, CLSPRC FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ?) T1,
(SELECT MAX(TRD_DD) TRD_DD, TRD_DD_WEEK FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA_WEEK GROUP BY TRD_DD_WEEK) T2 WHERE T1.TRD_DD = T2.TRD_DD) b,
(SELECT MAX(a.HGPRC) HGPRC, MIN(a.LWPRC) LWPRC, SUM(a.TRDVOL) TRDVOL, TRD_DD_WEEK FROM (SELECT T1.TRD_DD, T1.HGPRC, T1.LWPRC,T1.TRDVOL, T2.TRD_DD_WEEK FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA T1, APP.CHART_TEST_DATA_WEEK T2 WHERE T1.TRD_DD = T2.TRD_DD AND T1.CODE = ? ) a GROUP BY TRD_DD_WEEK) c
WHERE a.TRD_DD_WEEK = b.TRD_DD_WEEK AND a.TRD_DD_WEEK = c.TRD_DD_WEEK ORDER BY a.TRD_DD

mapping.getProperty: axis, close, open, high, low, trdvol, forn_ord_lmt_qty

sql.query:
SELECT a.TRD_DD, CAST(b.CLSPRC as int), CAST(a.OPNPRC as int), CAST(c.HGPRC as int), CAST(c.LWPRC as int), c.TRDVOL, a.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM (SELECT T1.TRD_DD, T1.OPNPRC, T1.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY, T2.TRD_DD_MONTH AS YM FROM (SELECT TRD_DD, OPNPRC, FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ?) T1,
(SELECT MIN(TRD_DD) TRD_DD, TRD_DD_MONTH FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA_WEEK GROUP BY TRD_DD_MONTH )T2
WHERE T1.TRD_DD = T2.TRD_DD) a,
(SELECT T1.CLSPRC, T2.TRD_DD_MONTH AS YM FROM (SELECT TRD_DD, CLSPRC FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ?) T1,
(SELECT MAX(TRD_DD) TRD_DD, TRD_DD_MONTH FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA_WEEK GROUP BY TRD_DD_MONTH )T2
WHERE T1.TRD_DD = T2.TRD_DD) b,
(SELECT MAX(T1.HGPRC) HGPRC, MIN(T1.LWPRC) LWPRC, SUM(T1.TRDVOL) TRDVOL, T2.TRD_DD_MONTH as YM FROM (SELECT TRD_DD,HGPRC, LWPRC, TRDVOL FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ?) T1,
(SELECT TRD_DD, TRD_DD_MONTH FROM APP.CHART_TEST_DATA_WEEK )T2
WHERE T1.TRD_DD = T2.TRD_DD GROUP BY T2.TRD_DD_MONTH) c
WHERE a.YM = b.YM AND a.YM = c.YM ORDER BY a.TRD_DD

mapping.getProperty: axis, close, open, high, low, trdvol, forn_ord_lmt_qty
